ygData.subject: Re: Frustated Necro
ygData.msgSnippet: Rathe Mountains and kill Giant Skeletons!  they are soooo plentiful!!  All you have to do is have your pet kill the yardtrash (lizardmen and bears) and they
ygData.messageBody:
Rathe Mountains and kill Giant Skeletons! they are soooo plentiful!! All you have to do is have your pet kill the yardtrash (lizardmen and bears) and they will POP up all over. Just be careful of Cyclopses and stay near Lake Rathe zone to run if ya have to. Also don't be afraid to /YELL for help lots of people killing cyclopses will help if you need it. I would prolly get a partner, it is so much more fun to group w/ 1 person than soloing. Soloing is boring IMHO

----- Original Message -----
From: Hu Anderson
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 8:20 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Frustated Necro


I am lvl 19 necro, hell lvl for me, and was wondering where is a good place
to hunt. Avaiks guards camped, gargolyes camped, crocs not enough give ex
and boring. Anyone have any other suggestions, grouping is fine with me :)


Shadoewalker
lvl 19 Necro
Brell
